data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of La Digue and Inner Islands, Seychelles.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Digue and Inner Islands, Seychelles
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 3.82 percent of the people of La Digue and Inner Islands are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, let the threatened of La Digue and Inner Islands, Seychelles know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of La Digue and Inner Islands to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, 3,000 people live in the state of La Digue and Inner Islands. Please, give them 6 new simple churches this year.
Spirit, please convict the believers in La Digue and Inner Islands, Seychelles to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.focus_label: La Digue and Inner Islands, Seychelles
data.section_summary:
the state of La Digue and Inner Islands, Seychelles has a population of 3,000.

We estimate La Digue and Inner Islands has 209 people who might know Jesus, 2,677 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 114 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in La Digue and Inner Islands, Seychelles not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

location.name: La Digue and Inner Islands
location.full_name: La Digue and Inner Islands, Seychelles
